comment: Restricted quantifier version of one direction of ~ 19.28 . (The other direction holds when ` A ` is nonempty, see ~ r19.28zv .) (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Jun-2023.)
